Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugars. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, drink mix, baking soda and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in malted milk balls. Shape into 1-1/2-in. balls. Place 2 in. apart on greased baking sheets.  Bake at 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes or until set. Cool for 1 minute before removing from pans to wire racks.
